pr_title: Add watchdog to diagnose deadlocks during image building

timeline.bodyText: For a series of com.oracle.graal.pointsto.util.CompletionExecutor#executes where isSequential() returns true wouldn't we also want heartbeatCallback.run() to be called for each?
timeline.author: olpaw

replies.bodyText: The sequential mode is more a relic from the past for testing, but for completeness I added it there too.
replies.author: christianwimmer

timeline.message: Add watchdog to diagnose deadlocks during image building
Add watchdog to diagnose deadlocks during image building
